semantic_title: Sequencing Rules for Code O94 with Sequelae Codes
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 15. Chapter 15: Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium > p. Code O94, Sequelae of complication of pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium > 3) Sequencing of Code O94

content.full_text: This code, like all sequela codes, is to be sequenced following the code describing the sequelae of the complication. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
content.summary: Code O94 must be sequenced after the code describing the actual sequelae, following standard sequela coding rules. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
key_concepts: Sequencing rules for sequela codes (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
O94 as secondary code (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
Standard sequela coding principles (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39)

detailed_rules.rule_text: O94 is sequenced following the code describing the sequelae (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
detailed_rules.explanation: Like all sequela codes, O94 is never the primary diagnosis but follows the code that describes the actual condition resulting from the pregnancy complication (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Code the current sequela condition first
Step 2: Sequence O94 as additional diagnosis

specific_codes.description: Sequelae of complication of pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
specific_codes.context: Always sequenced after the sequela condition code

code_patterns.description: Standard sequencing pattern for pregnancy sequelae (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)

references_to.title: General sequela coding rules
references_to.explanation: O94 follows standard sequela coding conventions

coding_scenarios.scenario: Patient with chronic condition resulting from previous pregnancy complication
coding_scenarios.documentation_example: Patient has chronic hypertension as sequela of previous pregnancy-induced hypertension
step_by_step: Step 1: Code the chronic hypertension first
Step 2: Add O94 as secondary diagnosis

correct_coding.rationale: Follows standard sequela coding rules where the condition is coded first, followed by the sequela code (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)

incorrect_coding.rationale: O94 should never be primary when coding sequelae
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Sequencing O94 before the actual sequela condition

warnings: Never use O94 as primary diagnosis (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
best_practices: Always sequence sequela condition first, then O94 (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
common_mistakes: Sequencing O94 before the sequela condition code
tips: Follow standard sequela coding conventions for all O94 usage
implementation_notes: Consistent with general ICD-10-CM sequela coding rules
clinical_context: Ensures proper documentation of causal relationships
